meanings.sent1: The rewriters made the story more interesting.
meanings.sent2: I hired a rewriters to help me with my essay.
meanings.sent3: The rewriters joked about changing the ending to a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a rewriters, crafting new tales from old ones.
meanings.sent5: The rewriters carefully polished each sentence to perfection.

meanings.definition: A tool or software used for rewriting text.
meanings.sent1: I used the rewriters to paraphrase the article.
meanings.sent2: The rewriters helped me rephrase the document quickly.
meanings.sent3: The rewriters program had a quirky feature that made text sound like a robot.
meanings.sent4: The rewriters tool transformed the text into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: With the rewriters software, rewriting became a breeze.
